definition: "speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149)/see also 言字旁[yan2 zi4 pang2]
to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue

sentences.english: She stayed at home and looked after her mother yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 来日诰日她呆正在家里照料她母亲了。

sentences.english: Could you get me two tickets for tomorrow here?
sentences.chinese: 你能否在这儿卖给我两张来日诰日的车票？

sentences.english: There will be a fine day tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 来日诰日将是一个好天。

sentences.english: Not at all. We'll meet our general manager tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 不客套，明天将来诰日带你去见一下我们总经理。

sentences.english: If I had money tomorrow, I would buy an expensive car.
sentences.chinese: 假定来日诰日我有钱了，我便购一辆贵的汽车。

sentences.english: How about if we go tomorrow instead?
sentences.chinese: 我们改成明天未来诰日去怎么样？
我明天将来诰日和他谋面。

sentences.english: Yesterday his mother wore an elegant dress and went the party.
sentences.chinese: 来日诰日他母亲脱着一件高雅的连衣裙往减进舞会了。

sentences.english: I hoped that we should spud in tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 我希望我们来日诰日能开钻。

sentences.english: If it should rain tomorrow, the crops would be saved.
sentences.chinese: 要是来日诰日下雨，庄稼就获救了。

sentences.english: I'd love to, but Ihave to get up early tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 我是很想再喝一点，但我明天将来诰日得夙起。

sentences.english: That find will be through Mary tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 那本书来日诰日将被玛丽带来。

sentences.english: I'm afraid I couldn't give you an answer today.
sentences.chinese: 死怕我来日诰日没有能回问您。
来日诰日清晨我没有能正在里里吗？
那将是更好的来日诰日。

sentences.english: Now drips the saliva, bags on sale, will become tomorrow the tear.
sentences.chinese: 如今流的哈喇子，将败为来日诰日的眼泪。

definition: to respect/to admire/to venerate/by the emperor himself
to go (to visit a superior)/one's current attainment in learning or art
father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
(old) ceremonial tablet (held by officials at an audience)
(history) to have an audience with the Emperor
